content.prompt: The Great Pyramids at Giza were most likely designed in the same shape as the traditional benben stone to emphasize their function as places where

choices.label: the gods were appeased through ritual sacrifices
the deceased ruler was reborn and ascended to the sky
priests read aloud from the Book of the Dead in ceremonial chambers
armies were entombed with the pharaoh to protect him in the afterlife
